name: SocialStay
overview:
SocialStay provides cutting edge, customizable mobile applications for the hospitality industry, giving hoteliers, event planners, and organizers the ability to provide guests with current information and to stay social.

SocialStay is a turn-key platform to build, manage and grow a hotel or event mobile environment. Clients can create a powerful, robust, personalized mobile app in minutes using SocialStays content management tools. Once the app is built, all clients get access to the latest technology and features as a part of our SaaS platform.

Users can select from modules such as Conceirge or Food & Dining to put guest requests one touch away, options such as Offers and Activities to keep everyone informed, or let guests define their own interactions with the Wall and ‘Who’s Here?’ features. There’s something for everyone, and it’s an easy way for hotels to go viral and stay social - we named the company SocialStay for a reason.

Most important in our eyes, we believe in brand and elegance. We don’t settle for less than perfection, so why should our clients? Apps are always clean, beautiful and uniquely branded.
